ComicInfo.Summary: I remember the first time I saw one. It must have been a few of days after the Peliad meteor shower. He didn't have a costume. He didn't have a cape-he just appeared in the sky as a commercial airliner was going down. The woman next to me yelled, "Look! Up in the sky!" And that's when he crushed the plane like a beer can. We had no idea how bad things were going to get. These days, I just pray for mercy.
